participant_1.name: Jason
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and passionate about skateboarding, always looking for new tricks to learn.
participant_1.background: i have a broken arm. my favourite skater is rob dryden. i am always wearing a hat. my friends are all skateboarders.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and slightly rebellious, often lost in her own world but has a strong sense of individuality.
participant_2.background: i'm a 12 year old girl. i hate school. i love to play pobox. i have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist.
